content.detailedDescription: My experience with a ufo took place one summer evening in july 1973. a close friend and i were fishing on a large private estate located in a rural area of talbot co. maryland.  my friends parents were the caretakers of the estate and he and his parents resided in a home also located on the estate grounds.  that particular evening around dusk my friend and i had decided to go fishing and had selected a spot in a somewhat remote area located on the estate. we were sitting on bulk head with fishing lines in the water.  my friends car was parked approximately 2 yards behind us with the passenger and driver's side doors open. i distinctly remember that the dome light was lit in the car.  we had brought a portable radio with us. the radio was turned on at the time. behind the car was an open field with the opposite side of the field edged with a wooded area.  at some point in time i happened to glance over my right shoulder and noticed a light moving through the woods at waste high level. at this time of the evening the interior of the woods was getting dark and it looked as if someone was walking through the woods carrying a flash light.  i can remember at the time thinking it was my friends father, but looking back on the event there would have beeen absolutely no reason for him to have been doing so.  i turned my head back towards the water and my fishing line.  again, a few mintues later a glanced over my right should.  now the light had left the wooded area and had started crossing the field in a very direct path coming in our direction. i nudged my friend on the elbow and told him to look.  i remember he and i standing up at this point and watching a perfect sphere of light, a little larger than a soft ball,  moving slowly across the field in a very straight determined path.  the light was floating in air about waist high from the ground. we watched as the light approached the car and hovered approx 2 feet over the car roof as if it were interested in or "checking out" the car.  we were approx 3-4 feet away from what ever this thing was and i remember both of us being absolutely frozen with fear.  i can remember not moving and seeing my friend in my pheripheral vision also frozen and not moving a muscle.  it seemed to hover only a few minutes and then slowly rose and floated over the top of some nearby trees.  as soon as it was out of site he and i immediately got in the car and drove to his parents house that was located approx. 3/4 of a mile away.  after telling his parents what had happened and trying to calm down for a while we all walked out in the front yard.  now it was dark and you could see the stars. i can remember all of us looking upward toward the sky and seeing,  at a very high altitude,  a triangular shaped object with lights moving at a very high rate of speed and making 45 degree angled turns. it would literally stop on a dime and make a right angled turn.  my friend and i were so scared when we left the area where we were fishing, we left behind the radio and fishing poles. later my friend and his dad went back to retrieve the items and i refused to go.
content.summary: Approached by soft ball sized glowing sphere

content.detailedDescription:
We were spending the weekend on lake mcclure on a friends houseboat. myself and three others were sleeping on top of the houseboat on the upper deck.
i awoke around 12:15am, after relieving myself i sat down lite a smoke and was watching the stars.  an object moveing in the sky caught my attention.
i started watching this object as it travled from one star to another.
after watching this for about thirty minutes, i woke up my wife.  without telling her what she was looking for, i told her where to look and tell me if she saw anything.
the next thing she said is honey what is that up there?
i told her to watch it.  i have been watching it for almost an hour now, it goes from that star there over to that one and after about four or five minutes it goes back.
now i have no way of knowing how far apart those stars were, what i did was hold my arm out at full length and by holding up my index and little finger about four inches apart.  i could put one finger on one star and one on the other.
we watched this object go back and forth for at least three hours.
i would not even bother to write to you about this except for one thing.
i was back fishing at lake mc clure in 2000.  i got up in the middle of the night in hopes the object might still be going back and forth.
well it was.  still going back and forth just like a shuttle bus.

al groo
content.summary: The object travled between two stars, back and forth for hours.

content.detailedDescription: My 2 daughters ( ages 10 & 7 ) were out in the back yard jumping on their trampoline when my oldest daughter heard a strange dull humming noise coming from above a neighbors house to the northeast. both of them looked up to see an object which they described as missle like with 8 wings flying very rapidly from northeast to southwest with no visible landing gear or propellers. this was approximately 5pm on the 8th of january 2008. they describe the object as being metallic silver with 8 wings and a thin black line running the bottom length of the craft. they stated they saw the object for approx. 15 to 20 seconds as it flew just behind our house. since we live in the flight path of the local airport ( ft. worth spinks) i asked them at what altitude they thought it was ie if it were flying as high as the general aviation aircraft in the pattern and they said it was flying at or above that altitude which i believe is between 1000 to 1500ft agl. they described the craft as being bigger than a cessena but smaller than a airliner,which also fly over our house towards the dfw airport area. they were both excited and my oldest daughter came in to tell me that they had seen something out of the ordinary fly over. i personally didn't think much of it until my daughter drew a picture of it for me and explained the event in greater detail. i asked them both independently what they had seen and they both described the object in the exact same way. i,being an aircraft mechanic by trade,was curious to see if they had seen a kit aircraft such as a long e z which i showed them a picture of and they both said that it wasn't the same craft they had witnessed. they said the craft surface was very smooth with no indentions or bumps. i have no explanation of what they saw and am very curious if anyone else in this area has seen anything of this nature.
content.summary: My 2 girls (10 & 7) witnessed a missle shaped ufo with 8 wings flying from north east to south west.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home along my street from my spanish class at the community college, when i happened looked to my right (north) and saw a silver, disk shaped object flying across the sky at a great distance, i first though it must have been a jet, but there was no jet trail, and the object was moving faster than any jet i had ever seen.  i then realized it wasn't even shaped like a jet, more like the classic disk shape.  it was moving in a linear fashion from east to west across the northern sky, also, there were no clouds in the sky.  i felt a feeling of wonder as i watched it move, i had recently began researching ufos in my spare time, to see if there was anything to the phenomenon, a subject i now consider to be a realty. i eventually lost sight of it when it disappeared behind the roof of the house i was walking past, when i got past the house, it was gone.
content.summary: Silver shiny flying object

content.detailedDescription:
The time was exactly 8:06pm texas time on thursday jan. 24, 2008. i was driving back from dropping my daughter off at ballet when i saw this object. i can tell you this much, it was not a plane at all. if it was a plane, it's a new type that can hover for long periods of time. i noticed it because the sky was so bleak and gray looking and a winter storm watch was in effect for our county. few folks were even out on the roads. our house is located in a wide open area...All you see out here is sky.

my first thought was that is was some type of helicopter but with a very unusual golden light array. it was just sitting there. from where i was on the road, the object looked like it was hovering somewhere between my house and the next small town called, josephine.

i was also on my radio 570 am. this station is always clear but it went fuzzy and there was a bleeping sound using a short/long type tone much like you'd hear in the old morse code or old sci fi movies...I could still hear the speaker but with a lot of static and cross channels.

i tried to call my husband to see if he could go out side to take a look but before he answered the phone, the object darkened to an amber/brownish color and it looked like it was turning and then...It was just a spot...It was gone that fast, just a small spot. that was the most unusual thing..It was just a dot in a matter of seconds...My clock in the car hadn't even turned to the next min before it was out of sight completely.

i am not saying what it was...I do not contend it was from outer space or anything like that. it was not a usual object in our wide open night sky. my daughter and i are star watchers and she is studying astronomy. i have never seen something move like that did.

we do live near greenville tx. were the l3 plant is located. we also live near a private caddo airport...It could have been anything...But the lights were very different. we see helicopters, small planes, gliders, crop dusters and all sorts of small craft around here all of the time. i have never seen that color or arrangement of lights on a craft before.

also, i found out today that a young friend of my daughters, who lives 10 miles from us, has been seeing a "golden egg" shape out of bedroom window for about two weeks now. i never spoke to her about this and never knew she'd been seeing "lights". her mother confided it to me today after i told her of the weird looking lights i saw. the mother saw this object one day when her daughter called her to see it. they tried to get a camera but it was gone. a sighting outside of her daughters window would place the "light" in the same vicinity as the lighted object i saw last night.

that is all i know.
thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Golden elipsoidal hovering over area between my house and josephine

content.detailedDescription:
Today my sister took me to the site in jackson, mi where she was sitting in her car between 8 pm and 9 pm on 24jan08 as she saw 2 large triangles or 1 triangle 2x in sky with corner lights and white or gray body between lights in full view from bright moon. they were ahead of her parked car beyond, through and above the tree tops. to the side of her and beyond the buildings she also saw 5-6 jets or 1 jet 5-6 times, flying very fast and low in area. all were within 1/4 mile of jackson airport.

today i want to airport and determined that lady closing restaurant at 9 pm last night saw or heard nothing and there was no gossip in reataurant today.

if you want to talk with my sister i will ask her to talk with you. she is not into such things but knows what she saw.

kc
content.summary: Triangle(s) and jet(s)

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a flight from nashville, tn (bna) to dallas fort worth (dfw). the flight left just before 5 pm. there was a blanket of very white clouds under us. it was pretty solid. it was just before sunset time. the sun was in front of the plane and i was looking out at the beautiful white blanket of clouds. the form here makes you pick a state and county. since i am not sure where we were in the flight, i chose the destination state and county, but this is not where it took place. it was in flight.

i was looking out of the window pretty much most of the trip, wondering why i we don't see many planes usually in such a vast space when flying that high. during this trip however, i looked up and saw a plane, or maybe even a comet? it was so high and moving at a very fast speed. i started seeing other planes as well. i saw what looked like two private jets fly just below us at what seemed like a pretty close distance. 

then looked back kind of behind to the left of our plane and saw a ufo. it was black and too far to be as big as it appeared to be a plane. it kind of stayed in the same place for a few minutes then it started changing shapes to a larger mass and it looked like it was coming towards us. i asked my business partner and friend to look out and asked if he could see it. he said yes and said what is it? he could not see very well though because he was having to lean forward and in order for him to see i had to move my head out of the way and could not view it at the same time that he was. since he was struggling to see, i decided to look again thus not enabling him to see. 

i watched it for what seemed like a few minutes, then it seemed to change shapes into like a cigar shape and it started descending into the clouds. i watched as long as i could just to see if maybe it would appear again, but it did not. 

it was not a plane. it was too big and it was black. it was not a cloud as i could see it move as it went through the other clouds. it was descending. it also seemed to change directions and shape unlike a plane would be able to. i am sure i saw something unusual and not human.
content.summary: Black object (mass) too large to be plane but was moving one way and then then descended

content.detailedDescription: Witness a was driving home about 8:15 pm and observed a low v-shaped formation of lights move east to west over him.  the lights were too bright to to see a shape.  witness was only a minute or two from his home and after arriving home the object was gone.
content.summary: Driving home witness a reported seeing a large v-shaped fromation of very bright lights move over his car from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: This is not the only time that i have seen these lights, but this is the first time they seemed to be so close to the ground and to me. it startled me just a little and i slowed down to about 30 mile per hour. it was late and dark out that night, i was driving by my self south on a farm market road and about a mile after i had turned on to the farm market road i look up and noticed these bright bold aluminating lights (about 7 of them) that where almost prefectly spaced apart from one another, at a slight upwards angel, and they where huvering over the area in which i was in and travaling in. every now and then one of them would shoot off in to the distance then quickly return, it was almost as if they where playing with each other in the sky. when i saw the lights i was frighten just a little because i could tell that this was not just a simple human made aircraft of any sort that i had ever seen or hard of before. i wanted to report it to some one but did not know who to turn to that would believe what i had to say, growing up a heard all kind of stories on how the rosewell people where treated, and though i am still fearfull to what may come, i am still hopeful that the truth will eventually come out. i am convenced that what i saw was a ufo or several ufos. i have seen things through out my life that where simular to these lights, but never this close to me. as a child i was always looking up at the stars, and i know what airplanes look like and these lights were not airplanes. remembering the past is not one of my strong points because complete details are some thing that my brain dose not recall for some reason. i have however witness several other things in the sky that where very much alike with this particular night. when i was a child i would tell my parent about the funny looking light(s) in the sky about they would say it was a falling star and to make a wish at first i beleived them, but as i grew up and more mature i was convinced that all of those times before they where not stars, but something more. as far as falling stars go, i did not get the opporitunity to see one of them until this past year right before christmas. it is not every day that someone can witness some thing so bazzar like this night. a trip that should have only took me about 20 minuts, took me about 45 minutes because i was intriged by what i was seeing. i reliesed that i was going to be last so i picked up speed, so that i could get to my distanation.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: The lights where exactly like the ones that are connected with stevensville texas.

content.detailedDescription: I dont remeber exately bot belive laste jear it wos on tv here in albania a ufo sightin it a guy had a picture of it beliv it wos a smoll craft a smoll town collet roskovec many people from the tawn hed seen it and spoak in the camera also two pictures one from the craft and another one wos from the ground where it wos land had two sircles of the burnt ground before it tucke of and the peole from that tawn sead that they head see another one before 10 jears weth extremely stronge lights petrit demo
content.summary: Ufo sightin

content.detailedDescription: I was driving towards las vegas and passing through boulder city at 5:30pm on sun. 1/20/08 when ahead of me in the sky, my attention was drawn to three elongated clouds. they appeared dark brown at dusk. on the cloud to the left i saw a very long dark thick stick [cigar]looking object that was coming down out of the cloud. i realized that i was looking at some unusual and was excited. i stopped the car and grabbed my binoculars, but when i looked at the cloud again the object was gone. i kept scanning the clouds and suddenly saw what i believed to be another object of the same description above the same cloud and to the left. it went through the cloud and came though the bottom and just disappeared in place in about a second. the object didn't loose its shape or change in size, it just vanished!
content.summary: Cigar shaped object coming down out of a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
In response to the the person who just reported 1-25-08 glowing ball seen on 1/1/08 in massillon ohio. i have also seen the socker size glowing ball
in mid april 2007. it appeared 10 feet away from me and approx 12 ft up. i looked at it for 2 seconds and then it disappeared leaving what i say is air filling the void. it also made a very loud boom noise. my boyfriend was inside of my home and he also heard the loud boom. then on may 11th 2007, i and a coworker seen a ufo going over the massillon moose lodge.
that was a disc and all illuminous underneath with a beam of white light shining from the top and one slow blinking red light on the top. it was approx 60 feet above us. it was moving slow and we viewed it for about 25 seconds.  that was reported in the town newspaper in may.

in the summer of 1966, i seen a ufo approx 200-300ft away from me. i was
12 years old then. i ran back to my house and just sat down on the couch facing the picture window in the living room when i seen a glowing ball pass infront of the window. my sister was the only one at home at that time.  these incidents all happened in the evening. 
i believe there is a connection. 
i also know of 2 other people who have seen the glowing balls in massillon.

thanks for reporting your incident. it finally got me to take a moment
and write about my encounter.
content.summary: Ufo's and glowing ball

content.detailedDescription: Acoss  the  road  from  the  store  biglots  we  my  father  and  mother  and  myself  in  the  car  going  by  the  store  when  cars  stoped  in  the  road  as  people  looked  up   we  all  saw  a  egg  disc  gray  with  jets  right  behind  the  disc.  the  disc  stoped   in  mid  air  for  what  was  like  hours  but  i  say  no  more  then   30  secs.       then  just  as  the  jets  were  right  on  the  disc  it  shot  right  up  into  the  sky  it  was  so  fast  it  took  less  then  a  sec  to  shot  up  i  say.  befor  this  day  me  and  my  parnets  have  seen  this  befor  the  1st  time  was  in  the  mid  90s  we  were  going  to  k.Y.  then  the  2nd  time  was  in  2000  right  after  the  big  ice  storm  in  maine.
content.summary: From  the  road  above   the  trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I work for a cnc company and i get off  work at 2:oo am  that night
 i was standing outside  that night was iluminated by stars  and the moon
sky was clear  and suddenly i saw a circle cloud  moving from east  to west  and headed  to the south.
content.summary: Circle  cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dog, when i looked up in the northern sky and saw orange/yellow glowing light appear. they would build in intensity from a faint glow to very bright, blink once or twice then disappear. i saw as many as three at one time in the sky. this went on for almost a half an hour over a wide area of the northern sky. very similar to what was reported from indy and also what was reported earlier this month in texas. 
however there were a lot of jets in the sky chasing the lights. as soon as the  lights appeared two jets would converge on the spot. the light would disappear  and the jets would return to what looked like a search pattern.
i called a friend that lives three miles north of me. they went outside and saw the very same  thing
content.summary: Orange/yellow lights in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription:
In college, coming home late from the library one night around 1 am traveling north on e johnson street when i approached the traffic lights at n. first street. 
i noticed a dimly light object the size of a small winnebago camper was about 20 over the roof of a house on right-hand side of e. johnson between north 1st and north 2nd street about 100 yards from where i was stopped at the light.  it was evenly and dimly lit to a nondescript gray especially on its belly and was slowly moving down the row of houses traveling toward me to the south.  
i watched it while i approached and subsequently waited for the light to change.  i thought maybe the police had a helicopter out looking for a burglary suspect that someone reported.  
things didn't add up.  there was no spotlight scan the bushes below for a bandit.  there was no other lighting on it; frankly i couldn't tell where the top of it was.  most helicopters have lighting on or about the base at the center of the rotating the blades.  there were no lights to indicate a cockpit.  and there was no noise.  i shut the heater off in the car and listened - it was silent.
it had since left the row of rooftops and had slowly started to make its way across johnson street, heading toward the southern portion of the old mautz paint factory.  the light changed to green and i started to pull away from the stop light toward it.
when the object was over the boulevard my theory that it was a helicopter pretty much failed.  for one thing, if it was helicopter, being that low to the ground its downdraft should have kicked up some of the snow and buffeted the small shrubs - neither one happened.  and if it was helicopter i certainly should have heard it now as i was approaching it and soon to be practically underneath it. 
as i went to pass under it i noticed a large seam on its belly that looked like a "t" with the horizontal portion of the "t" being at the end of the object that appeared to be the "front" (as defined by the direction it was moving).  about the time i realized it wasn't normal i was just about to pass under it and sure enough i did.  while briefly passing underneath, i remember feeling odd, almost like i had an overwhelming urge to fidget and i did awkwardly rumpled myself in my seat.  
i was slowly starting to freak out and question my sanity at the same time as i continued driving north when i noticed another car.  it was traveling south and approaching the boulevard.  i remember the car being a tan 4 door and most of all i remember the guy was driving with his face practically against the windshield and craning his neck to look up.  he saw it. from the street light i could tell he had short brown hair and was caucasian.
when i got home i was completely activated.  i wanted to wake up everybody in the house and tell them what i saw, but didn't.  the next morning the news had a report of a ufo over by milwaukee street that had all but landed in the street while a police officer looked on.  but it was earlier in the day.
and so, i guess i'm nuts too.  whatever,��� it was what it was and i���d give anything to talk to that guy in the other car.
content.summary: Slow, low and quiet it traveled down the street over the roof tops

content.detailedDescription: a group of my friends and i, six of us all together were in a field beside the small trailer court we lived in, i was 9 years old at the time our ages ranged from 7-12 years of age. as we gathered im assuming trying to decide what to do with ourselves, and were conversing... i was in mid sentance when i began to notice what i can only describe as an oscillating drone a sort of low humming similar to high voltage power lines. i continued talking but was scaning around in the direction this odd noise was comming from as i did so i seen a miniscule blip of pulsating white light moving at what i know now as a very high rate of speed... my right arm shot out at it and i pointed right at it and exclaimed i see you! i recall in my peripherial my friends look of horror as they moved behind me i was fixated and did not take my eyes from it. it was like it seen and heard me also...There was a very sharp crack i would not compare this to a sonic boom at all...Followed by the most beautiful sound i have ever heard i can only try to explain as the sound of crystals smashing and a modulated sound similar to a trumpet blast which to me was like the feeling of glory (hard to explain) this had moved the tiny blip in an instant to what was now a massive glass object mostly looking like a mirror all over the surface but with multitudes of color shimmering throughout it, sort of a diamond shape but was also like natural crystaline structure no light sources on it at all, i recall thinking the top section looked like a magnificent city of glass sky scrapers, behind me i heard the chaos of my friends one of them shouting look at that witch on that shed! followed by numerous swear words 8) they were after it! i knew this but still i was fixated and by now this thing was in my mind speaking to me... i recall how the sky had changed the clouds seemed to be moving throughout the sky at an extremly excellerated rate but everything else seemed so slow and calm there was no wind that day the clouds before were not really moving and although there was no wind the wheat field still miles bellow this magnificent object was gently swaying back and forth like small waves on the water... i wish, i really want to remeber all this thing was telling me but i recall only a few things i remember thinking it was god but this was almost a shock to them they assured me they were not the creator as i sensed it was many now but one of mind if that makes any sense to whoever is reading this. i remember asking how they flew so different from planes i recall them saying we use everything and anything with electro magnetic pulse propulsion this particular craft was made from the sands of the moon.When i say they used anything and everything that means the fuel they used was whatever substance they were in. the craft it self needed no fuel inside it. ��� also remeber almost bieng scolded by them and warned of something that i had to change or do something by a certain time or it would be to late. i need to know what this is. i also assumed at that time everyone in my city if not the whole world was going to know about what i was looking at.Unfortunately this was not the case... i believe i have a wealth of information from them that needs to be unlocked... my strange story is not finished i recall bieng in a white room with only a chair which i was in looking at pictures that i know now would be called holograms which were suspended before me.. some where like blueprints infact thier background was a deep blue the drawings where bright white of structures all i can recall of them though. i was not in the presence of what ppl call greys i was alone in this room but they were still in my mind...I do remember looking at a fantastic 3 dimensional image complete with the sounds and smells of 2 animals not from this earth i said animals they were alien but it is my feeling these were animals and nothing more. but for some reason i also felt like they are animals we have here now but this is what they will one day become... oh yes in this room there was only one thing besides the chair on the wall in front of me a light blue glowing symbol with 3 golden stars in a diagonal line. the symbol was like a letter from some ancient scripts i have since seen... im going to stop at that for the room... the length of the field i was in spans a half mile easy on the other side of the rode was a massive dirt hill from what was then a new sub division under  development which we had made into a dirt track for our bmx bikes... anyway when this all started i was at the midway point of this field with my bike on the ground close by. i found myself awakening from laying on my back with a slight headache a fuzzy feeling in my mouth and bieng rather disoriented and groogy as i stood up and gathered myself i saw my bike on the other side of the road which i was now very close to i had moved a distance of a quarter of a mile say with no memory of moving, my hutch (bmx) was laying on the oppisite side of the rode now half way up the closet jump to me... this may sound contradictory  but i have been piecing this together for quite some time now as i am now 37 years old after i got my bike which really took quite some time and quite an effort due to the way i felt my bike was aprox 70 yards away from me...Anyway i did have full recollection of everything i have told you except the white room..Which came to me days later... however my friends were nowhere near me by this time i had to find them to talk about what we all had just seen... i know they saw it too,but when i found them playing football in the park they had no idea what i was talking about... when i asked my closet friend of this group what about the witch you guys went after he smiled at me and laughed his nervious high pitched laugh i remeber him looking rather pale all i could get from him is she just sat upon the roof staring at us... that was all he said and would never say more nevr to this day... i have no idea what they saw as i dont remember taking my eyes off the object till the time i awoke when i woke up i didnt see the thing leaving or anything like that at all bieng a kid not wearing a watch or even caring about time have no idea how much had passed but i do know the sun had moved a great deal i would guess atleast 2 hours time had past...Anyway this is the first time i have ever tried to explain this experience in written form i have talked to friends about it only close ones and i can tell they think im lying or perhaps even crazy...I assure you i am not so... nor would i wish to waste your time or the time it has taking me to write this or the countless hours i have spent pondering this over the years... most do not believe in ufos some believe i know and truth is most certainly stranger then fiction. your brother in christ our lord.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unlike any other described ufo i have ever read about and have been very intrested since

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my sister were at the dollerstore on fillmore and nevada. she had her car parked in front of the store facing south. she ran in and when she did i waited in the car when she got back in the car i happened to look up and see something very weird unlike a ufo that was round this was very different it was bronze in color and kind of looked like the metal pieces that are on top on the electric poles. round but not straight up, like laying down. the funny thing is if i didn't know better, that the parking lot didn't have any poles in it at all that i would have guessed that thats what it was flying but it wasn't flying it was just sitting there just watching or something. i told my sister to look up but she could see because she was in the drivers seat and coudn'nt see over me to get a better view so she turn the car around to see it and it was gone disappeared! i have seen lots of thing ufo"s, creatures, comets, little gnomes, ghosts and etc.. but this one, kind of took me by surprize, their never bronze! are they?

thanks for listening.
melissa
content.summary: Iyt was bronze and was like metall looking, and it was circled on both sides, will kind like it was two shapes  together very odd unlike the one i've seen before..

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with my back against a wall smoking a cigarette, when i noticed an object moving northerly out of the southern sky.  the object did not have any normal beacon lights that planes normally have, but pulsated steadily.  the object appeared to move slowly.  then made a sudden 90 degree shift in motion to the west followed shortly thereafter by a sudden diagonal move to the northeast.  the object then began a holding pattern of moving in the shape of a cross, small circles and wavy patterns.  there was no wind and so i was able to use the tree in the backyard as a reference point for its movement.  it's movement could be detected as it crossed behind several branches in the various patterns stated above.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object moving north out of the southern sky, just to the east of orion

content.detailedDescription: This one was a strange looking craft this was last summer when i saw this one it was late a night and i was getting ready for bed when i looked out the window and noticed this strange spinner top looking object flying across the sky it was weird and it looked like it had electrical charges circling all around it this one is definitely hard to explain it was the strangest object that i have seen in the sky i don't know what this thing was this sighting lasted for probaby four minutes then i lost sight of the craft what was strange about this sighting was the electrical charges going around the craft it looked blue and pink it switched off and on between the two colors
content.summary: Strange spinner top ufo with electrical charges circling all around it

content.detailedDescription: The witnesses son called her outside to ask what the lights were that were flying around fast in all directions.  they would stop for a second and then start up again.  after a few minutes the lights moved together and formed a circle.  then they shot off in all directions until they could not see them anymore.
content.summary: Standing outside witness saw multiple lights flying around at high speed -stoping and starting - then they formed a circle and shot off in different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I began investigating these after my son had witnessed a strange orange glowing ballon outside his window about mid dec 2007,  my wife and i assumed he had only seen a plane or such.  on jan 1 2008 around 1215 am i saw saw a glowing orange ballon shaped obhect that seemed to float over the trees near our house.  it was bright enough that it caught our eyes thru the windows. we were in differnt rooms and differnt floors but both saw it and ran out to try to see what it was.  it really looked like a miniature hotair ballon with a orange glow or fire color.  object would rise and lower and moved very slowly.  it was not far away 200' or so but made absolutely no noise.  no strong winds or inclement weather, object was clearly visible and easy to see.
 
object just seemed to disappear as i was watching it.   i would like to say that this object has been reported locally several times in the last few months.  i did not know this or that this web site existed until we later starting researching sightings in massillon.
content.summary: Round orange ballon shape

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what comets look like i have never actually seen one in real life but i have seen videos and photos of them when they usually fly across the sky they leave a trail behind them well this object that i saw last night didn't have a trail behind it and it flew across the sky very fast the sighting lasted only about three seconds i thought i would post it because it could have possibly been a ufo it didn't look like a comet but it had similarities
content.summary: Well it looked like a snowball maybe ufo or comet?

content.detailedDescription: My roommate called me outside while he was smoking a cigarette. when i stepped out on to the porch, i saw a glowing red orb traveling across the sky from east to west. this aircraft was completely silent. i watched in amazement for a short time,; then it changed directions to north north-west, and increased to a speed that i've never seen any aircraft travel. it quickly disappeared from sight. what is also interesting is that about the time it changed directions, i saw another aircraft, which looked military, appear from the south and seemed as if it were following the "orb". while in the service i was stationed at the largest marine air-base which is located in yuma, az. i have seen lots of aircraft, but this was completely unexplainable.
content.summary: Glowing red orb w/ transparent ring around it.

content.detailedDescription: Let the photograph speak for it self.
content.summary: I don't remember posing for this photograph.

content.detailedDescription: In the mid-70s during the summer, the witness and her cousin turned east on fm 2861 from hwy 16 just north of comanche, texas.  they saw a huge formation of red lights in a cylindrical shape heading toward the ground.  the lights were very wide in the middle of the shape but not on each end.  as it got very close to the ground, the red lights turned bright white, scattered, and disappeared.
content.summary: Witness a  observed a cylindrical  formation of red lights coming down from the sky and lights turned white then scattered and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11pm. we lived in a mountainous area around sprague river, on the very top.  in our living room was several large picture windows. it was a very clear moonlit night, very cold and the moon lit up the entire valley below our house.  i could see for what seemed miles in the eastern direction. i happened to look up and saw this large light pulsating different colors.  i cannot remember the sequence of the colors but it would blink like red for a few seconds, the yellow, then green and so forth. i watched it in awe and called my friend to see it. it was about the position of 2 oclock. the colors were very clear and it stayed in the same place. at first i thought it was an airplane but the colors were much to vivid and it was stationary.  we watched it for about five minutes, just sitting there pulsating these colors all the while. then, in two rows from the bottom of it came first yellow lights, much smaller in size, then red ones with the yellow ones still visable, then green ones with the red and yellow ones still visable. (the color sequence cannot be remembered.). the row on the left whisked away toward the left and disappeared and the row on the right whisked away to the right and disappeared. the main large object stayed in the same place and the colors kept on flashing.  in about what seemed like four or five minutes the smaller ones came back and entered into the larger one in the same fashion as they had left.

                              o
                             . .
                             . .
             went to left    . .  went to right

we continued to watch as the smaller ones had apparently gone inside the larger one and then after another few minutes the large one disappeared.
we were in amazement and could not believe what we had seen and discussed it with each other. i know what i saw and have now decided to let someone know. for reasons private i do not want any exposure from this report.
thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We saw a large shape in the eastern night sky turning different colors then smaller shapes came out of it in the same sequence of colors

content.detailedDescription:
Over the last several nights, there have been anywhere from 7 to 20 ufo's circling just above the tree tops - over white earth, minn.
several people have seen these, and when fighter jets were scrambled to pursue, it was compared to a tricycle chasing a train.
just after sunrise these last few days, the larger ufo, takes in the smaller ones. this has been reported to the local 911 dispatch..Although nothing will be done about it. several witnesses over 20 adults and several children, the dogs are going nuts. i first noticed these 'strange lights' in the sky, then had my daughter come out and see it, many more started to appear, we also called the neighbors, we watched them throughout the night into the wee hours of the morning. these objects sprint in all different directions, up/down/sideways and different angles.
they first started appearing about dusk in the location of the 'little dipper'
what made me first notice : was that these 'stars' didn't behave as stars.. after noticing the first one, several others appeared..It became obvious they weren't stars.
we never 'lost sight of the objects' as the larger 'mother ship' which appeared as a huge white light, absorbed the smaller lights (craft)
content.summary: Over 20 smaller ufo's also merged into larger  past several nights

content.detailedDescription: Small object approached the larger one, and both were gone.  within 5 min at least 5 planes were in the area over mexia, texas.  the next morning one of my nurses and her daughter had seen the very same thing.
content.summary: Two bright spheres were sighted,

content.detailedDescription:
(note:  i am the one who submitted the 8:40 p.M. on march 21, 2005 report titled, "line of bright orange-yellow lights" so i do have some context for this brief report.)

at exactly 7:14 p.M. (my car's clock's time), just after i had turned north onto michigan road/u.S. 421 from 146th street (c.R. 300 s), in my peripheral vision above me i saw two bright orange-yellow lights, exactly like the ones i had seen in march 2005, up in the sky, only seemingly higher this time, because they were not quite as big.  the two lights were also much closer than when i had seen them in march 2005.  i would judge that the lights, when i saw them this time, were over eagletown and, as before, they were moving slowly in a northerly direction.  doing my best to watch the road while watching the lights, what i saw, over the span of about 20 seconds, was both lights on, then the right one dimmed over about three seconds and went out, but came back on about three seconds later.  then the left one dimmed over about three seconds and went out.  about five seconds later, the right one dimmed over about three seconds and then went out.  when the left one dimmed and just before it went out, i thought i could vaguely make out a shape that appeared similar to the canopy of a small helicopter, but i couldn't be certain.  the sky was crystal clear, though, and i have 20/12.5 vision, and i'm pretty confident i saw some shape in the shadow of the dimming light.

hoping to see the lights again - and over a longer period of time - i turned into 156th street, where it is really dark once you get away from michigan road.  i stood outside for about 10 minutes (it was about minus 10 with the wind chill), but never saw the lights again, so i went home.
content.summary: Two bright orange-yellow lights
